KnowledgeItem.Title: AddSudoUserWorkflow
KnowledgeItem.Description: Initiates the workflow for adding a user to sudoers list by writing into the MARS model and creating new corresponding DataBlocks in the Issue.

IssueCondition.Description: Searches for an Issue with DataBlock AddSudoUserWorkflow and triggers the workflow for successful completion.

Activate.XMLExtract:
<NewBlock><Tasks
				TargetMachine=${ASUW:TargetMachine}      
				TargetState=Created
				User=${ASUW:User}
				Lib=PKG
				PKG=sudo
				Host=${ASUW:Host}
				CurrentState=ReadState
				TaskNumber=${PROTASKS:NumberTotal}
				/> </NewBlock>

<NewBlock><Tasks
				TargetPath='${ASUW:TargetPath}'
				TargetMachine=${ASUW:TargetMachine}
				TargetState=Created
				User=${ASUW:User}
				Host=${ASUW:Host}
				Lib=RUNCOMMAND
				Command='sudo adduser ${ASUW:LinuxUser} sudo'
				CurrentState=ReadState
                TaskNumber=${PROTASKS:NumberTotal}
				/></NewBlock>
